description:
test: prepare for 64-bit ints

Minor tweaks to avoid assuming that int is always 32 bits.

Update issue 2188.

messages.text:
Looks like I should not have submitted this before the runtime CL. Oh
well. Please just ignore the test failure until everything else is
submitted. (It happens late enough in the build.)

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9821ce07edde ***

test: prepare for 64-bit ints

Minor tweaks to avoid assuming that int is always 32 bits.

Update issue 2188.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
